text.text_translated:
Many businesses work across countries today. Most business people speak English. But how people talk in business is different. Each country has its own ways. People also expect different things when they talk.
We must know these cultural rules. If we do not understand them, we can have problems. We can judge people wrongly. We can misunderstand them. Our business talk can stop completely.
Etiquette means polite rules for how to act. There are three main differences in business etiquette around the world. These can help you be ready. They help when you work with people from other countries.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Many businesses work across countries today. Most business people speak English. But business talk is not the same everywhere. Each culture has its own ways of talking. People also expect different things.
We must know these cultural ways. If we do not understand them, we can have big problems. We can judge people unfairly. We can misunderstand them. Our business talk can stop working.
Etiquette means polite rules for how to act. There are three important differences in business etiquette around the world. These can help you do well. They help when you work with people from other cultures.
